resources.string: Draw your unlock pattern to confirm removal.
Draw your pattern again to confirm. Please remember this pattern. If you forget it, you’ll need to factory reset this device.
Patterns does not match, please try again
You can secure your account on this device by setting an unlock pattern. You’ll need to draw this pattern each time you want to access your account on this device.
